Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy will allow for good stroke play and the batters will find it easy to bat on the surface.
The surface will not allow a lot of assistance to the bowlers and wicket taking is going to be difficult.
The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 228 runs.
There is moderate rain expected which may affect playing conditions.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
Others: Sri Lanka will be up against the West Indies in the 2nd match of the West Indies in Sri Lanka, 3 ODI Series, 2024Â  the match will be played at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy on 23rd October 2024 at 02:30 PM IST.
Sri Lanka and West Indies have played 1 match in the series, with Sri Lanka winning all the games played so far.

Charith Asalanka was the Man of the Match and Charith Asalanka scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 126 match fantasy points while Gudakesh Motie topped the fantasy points leaderboard for West Indies with 95 match fantasy points.
